name: UseDotNet
description: Acquires a specific version of the .NET Core SDK from the internet or the local cache and adds it to the PATH. Additionally provides basic auth.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version Spec of the version to use.  Examples: 10.x, 10.15.1, >=10.15.0

inputs.name: packageType
inputs.label: Package to install
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please select whether to install only runtime or full SDK.

inputs.name: auth
inputs.label: Auth
inputs.helpMarkDown: The authentication feed name to use

inputs.name: nuGetFeedType
inputs.label: NuGet Feed Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of NugetFeed used in the auth field. Can either be an internal feed or external service connection

inputs.name: feedId
inputs.label: Feed id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The id of the internal feed to use for auth

inputs.name: externalEndpoint
inputs.label: NuGet server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The external feed to use for auth
